title: Indila Cover Typo - Font or drawed by designer ?
content:
Found this on actual CD cover of Indila. I like it, WhatTheFont did not found anything.  
I think it is an illustratiion, but maybe some of you know a font like this. the 'A' must not be as shown, but the D does.  
Thank you for replies.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830085723im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Indila_5804.jpg)
author: bildsprache

comments.content:
There is a similar font called **Hair-2** - /A is different.  
The copyright says "Copyright (C) 1992, Smena-SPSL Corp." but I can't find any info about the designer or any legitimate download link to post.  
See the image bellow:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830085723im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hair-2-font_5768.jpg)

On a second thought, your sample could be simply based on a compressed/modified **[Kabel Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830085723/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Kabel%20Light%20-%20Regular&fid=3de15e0d505710d8ecdc17eecc1c05b2&fsize=60&text=INDILA&fit=1)**
